application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
description: Submission pursuant to Conditions 4.2 (Re-phasing) and 4.4 (Indicative Construction Programme) of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood regeneration area to: create two new sub-phases, 'Phase 1A (North) (Infrastructure 3)' to contain Tilling Road West Realignment and Improvement Works (Part 1) and M1/A406 and A5/A406 Junction Improvements and, 'Phase 5E' to contain Plots 22, 23 and 24; make amendments to Phases 3, 4, 5 and 6; and, change the timing of delivery of Plot 24, Plot 43 and the Market Square within the Indicative Construction Programme
